definitions: To bring back into use or existence.
To return to a former condition, place, or position.
To repair or renovate (a building, work of art, etc.) so as to return it to its original condition.
To give (something stolen or lost) back to its owner.
examples: The government aims to restore peace to the region.
They worked to restore the old painting.
Please restore the book to its shelf.
The company promised to restore the data after the crash.
